name: ExcuseMe,byLaldyLabs
0:
”Alexa, open Excuse Me”
”Alexa, tell Excuse Me I need an excuse”
”Alexa, ask Excuse Me to give me an excuse”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: excuse me
des:
Excuse Me is the original and best Alexa skill when you need an instant and original excuse for one of life's sticky situations.

Since launching in 2018, with a vast library of over 160,000 excuses, Excuse Me has saved the skin of literally thousands of latecomers, work-shy employees, reluctant partners and spouses, and habitual homework dodgers.

Need an explanation for why you were late, forgot to do your report, missed a Zoom meeting, can't possibly come over tonight, or stood someone up?

Look no further - Excuse Me has your back.

Excuse Me is the Advocate of Alibi. The Defender of the Indefensible. The Paragon of Pretext.

To use this skill, just say:

 Alexa, open Excuse Me
 or
 Alexa, ask Excuse Me for an excuse

If you think the first excuse will just get you into deeper trouble, just keep going till you find the right one for the occasion. Don't worry, you're far more likely to run out of time than excuses.

You can say things like…

 Get me another
 or
 Another excuse please
 or
 Let's hear more

Other things you can ask:

 How many excuses do you know?
 Could you repeat that please?

If you forget all this, just say Help. Excuse Me will make some suggestions, and drop them into a card in your Alexa app.

You don't need to be near your Echo device to get your excuses. Excuse Me drops each one into a card in your Alexa app. So after playing with the skill for a while, you'll have a stock of great excuses right there on your phone whenever you need one! 

Excuse Me is intended for fun, and what could be more fun than dodging the things you just don't want to do?
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
